column4: Sorry. i was just figuring out how to join back into the Ubuntu IRC list again. Sorry to bother y'all.
what would you people do if your computer housing lack a sufficient number of CD drive bays?
I mean, these large disk drives can also be used to hold front mounted ports (see www.frontx.com as an example,) wireless bluetooth dongle receivers (useful on HTPC's,) temperature readers, etc.
id scrap the case and spread the computer out by screwing the bits into the wall, obviosly youd need some extra long cables but it would look pretty nifty eh?
